## ParameterTransform() function

Parameter descriptor that is used for transforming parameter before serialization

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ParameterTransform(methodName?: string): (target: WebSocketClient, propertyKey: string, parameterIndex: number) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  methodName | string | Name of method that will be called to modify parameter, method takes any type of object and returns transformed object |

<b>Returns:</b>

(target: [WebSocketClient](./rest-stompjs.websocketclient.md)<!-- -->, propertyKey: string, parameterIndex: number) =&gt; void
